page.description: The FUNCTIONS_GET() function returns a list of function prototypes - types of '*' means all types, Limitations F=functions,X=xbasic,G=graphic.
page.syntax: Function_List as C = FUNCTIONS_GET(C Types,C Limitations)

argument.name: Function_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of function names and prototypes.

page.example: dim flist as C flist = functions_get("*", "F") fcount = line_count(flist) ? fcount = 1158
